clues.text: Maggio is the Italian name for this month

It's the priestly class of Hinduism

clues.text: From the Latin for "horse", this 6-letter adjective means pertaining to or resembling a horse

rounds.comments: (Alex: That's the Culinary Institute of America.)

clues.text: The one-day "Teenagers in the Kitchen" course focuses on this food & the dough for it

rounds.text: This 15th century person said, "I had a banner of which the field was sprinkled with lilies"; written on top: "Jhesus Maria"
